formula: 150 if gross_pay <= 5999 else 300 if gross_pay <= 7999 else 400 if gross_pay <= 11999 else 500 if gross_pay <= 14999 else 600 if gross_pay <= 19999 else 750 if gross_pay <= 24999 else 850 if gross_pay <= 29999 else 900 if gross_pay <= 34999 else 950 if gross_pay <= 39999 else 1000 if gross_pay <= 44999 else 1100 if gross_pay <= 49999 else 1200 if gross_pay <= 59999 else 1300 if gross_pay <= 69999 else 1400 if gross_pay <= 79999 else 1500 if gross_pay <= 89999 else 1600 if gross_pay <= 99999 else 1700 if gross_pay >= 100000 else 0
